text: Belotić () or Mačvanski Belotić () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Bogatić municipality, in the Mačva District. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and the population numbered 1,744 people in a 2002 census. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *Mačva Category:Mačva Category:Populated places in Mačva District
title: Belotić (Bogatić)
